name: Cerame-Unie
goal: Cerame-Unie represents the European Ceramic Industry. Our mission is to ensure that the voice of this competitive, dynamic, and innovative industry is heard at the EU level. Our membership is drawn from the national ceramics associations across Europe with whom we work to provide solutions to challenges affecting both the industry and wider Europe.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Cerame-Unie in particular covers the following EU policy issues:

Environment, health, and safety;
Climate change and energy;
Trade and internal market;
Construction and sustainability;
Research and innovation;
Raw materials;
Standardisation.

In these areas Cerame-Unie aims at promoting a fair and competitive environment.
